description: A sea region in the New World where the Z's Ambition Arc takes place. This is where the three-way battle between the Straw Hats, Neo Marines, and Marine forces occurs.

keyEvents.title: Three-Way Battle
keyEvents.description: The Maubeugemour Sea becomes the battleground for a chaotic three-way conflict between Momonga's Marines, Shuzo's Neo Marines, and the Straw Hat Pirates.
keyEvents.significance: Setting for the climactic confrontation of the Z's Ambition Arc.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Kicked Into the Sea
keyEvents.description: Luffy is kicked into the waters of the Maubeugemour Sea during combat with Shuzo, requiring rescue by Zoro.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the ongoing danger the sea poses to Devil Fruit users.

statusHistory.reason: Ongoing location in the New World
